articles.author: ESPN staff
articles.title: College football's best traditions, mascots, rivalries and more
articles.description: From heated rivalries to live mascots to the electric entrances, college football is unlike any other sport. Our writers provide their favorite quirks that make the game so remarkable.
articles.content: From the Miami Hurricanes entering through smoke to Traveler, the live horse mascot of the USC Trojans, galloping the sidelines in Los Angeles, college football provides its fans with an experience t… [+19262 chars]

articles.title: Biles returns to claim balance beam bronze, Guan wins gold
articles.description: Simone Biles made a fearless return to competition on Tuesday, capping a tumultuous Tokyo Games with a bronze medal on the balance beam.
articles.content: The final gold of the women's artistic gymnastics programme would go to China's Guan Chenchen with a score of 14.633 and the silver to her compatriot Tang Xijing but it was Biles who grabbed the spot… [+2904 chars]

articles.author: Caradisiac.com
articles.title: Prise en mains - BMW Série 2 (2021) : la der des ders ?
articles.description: Bien que tourné vers la mobilité électrique, BMW n’en oublie pas ses fondamentaux. La nouvelle Série 2 le prouve, elle qui, de l’aveu même de ses concepteurs, constitue un cadeau aux fans de la marque. Voilà qui annonce la couleur ! Premier essai, quelques jo…
articles.content: Quand on est BMW, on ne fait pas ce qu'on veut sans réflexion : la marque possède en effet une « fan base » à qui on ne fait pas avaler des couleuvres. Le moindre pas de travers, la moindre entorse à… [+6803 chars]

articles.author: ROBERT VAN ROYEN
articles.title: Tokyo Olympics: Tom Walsh survives almighty scare to qualify for shot put final
articles.description: Tom Walsh's Olympic campaign looked set for a premature end, before he successfully had a foul overturned.
articles.content:
Kiwi shot put ace Tom Walsh survived an almighty scare to qualify for Thursdays shot put final in Tokyo.
 The 29-year-old Rio bronze medallist looked set for a premature departure from the competiti… [+3171 chars]
